summary:
Hello Everyone! I’m Marco, a highly analytical and versatile professional with substantial expertise in driving IT business transformation and ensuring adoption of latest technologies/operating models.

Throughout my career, I have built track record of success in planning/spearheading data-driven programmes, developing strategic business plans, and implementing improvement initiatives.

Moreover, it is my passion to share my knowledge, expertise, and insight on determining roadblocks, analysing/meeting unique requirements, and executing digital transformation initiatives.
 
I add value and contribute to the success of the organizations by managing project portfolios, operational teams, leading software migrations, and conducting gap analysis for future decision-making.

Some of my key expertise includes:
• Change Management         
• Strategic Planning & Execution
• Process Improvement      
• Business Case Management
• Stakeholder Engagement
• Contract Negotiation
 
I am customer-focused individual, skilled in nurturing long-term productive relationships whilst collaborating with cross-functional teams.
 
Connect with me today to find out how I will make your mission my mission, to help bring all of your business objectives into focus!

profile_positions.description:

Some of my key contributions include:

• Led execution of safety laboratory services in (US-based) Clinic by implementing IT solutions equipment.
• Delivered exceptional support in consolidating US recruitment websites into one future state solution for three early-phase Clinics.
• Served as a proactive member of the IT Business Partners Leadership team.
• Rendered expert-level support in managing projects, overseeing enhancement intake requests, and prioritising tasks in collaboration with business leaders.
